title: ESA Registration
content: The ESA registration and course feedback thing didn't show up for me last week for ESA May 2023 on pesu academy. Has this happened to anyone else and what should I do? :/ or has anyone ever missed out on giving feedbacks and then registering for esa before and what did you have to do?

comments.body: You don't have to do anything. For regular esa it doesn't matter. I've spoken to the CoE regarding the same and be said we'll receive our admit card

If this is for managing anxiety or anything mental health related, I’d say go the legit route. [HelpfulPets.com](https://helpfulpets.com/) made it super straightforward, video chat with a therapist, and they don’t just hand you a letter unless you qualify. Way better than the fake looking registry sites.
